Identification: Please provide your 10 digit phone number or 10 digit customer id.
Authentication: Please provide your 4 digit customer pin for verification.
MainMenu: Thanks for calling Contoso Support, Say what you need help with? Say Home or press One for Magenta Home, Say Mobile or press two for Magenta Mobile, Say TV or press three for Magenta TV help

MagentaTV: Thanks for choosing Magenta TV, wait while we connect to an available agent.
